text: Robert Irvine (born September 5, 1974) is an English born Canadian former soccer player. == Playing career == Irvine played in 1998 with Albany Alleycats in the USISL D-3 Pro League. Midway through the season he signed with the Toronto Lynx of the USL A-League, and made his debut on July 19. 1998 against Rochester Raging Rhinos. The following season he played with Glen Shields Sun Devils in the Canadian Professional Soccer League. He recorded his first goal on June 6, 1999 against London City. == International career == He made his debut for the Canada men's national under-17 soccer team on March 25, 1991 against Netherlands Antilles. == References == Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Albany Alleycats players Category:Toronto Lynx players Category:York Region Shooters players Category:USISL D-3 Pro League players Category:USL A-League players Category:Canadian Professional Soccer League (1998–2005) players Category:Footballers from Leeds Category:Association football midfielders Category:Syracuse Orange men's soccer players Category:La Salle Explorers men's soccer coaches Category:Canadian soccer coaches
title: Robert Irvine (soccer)
